tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE StemCellDifferentiation (
  cell_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  cell_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  differentiation_potential VARCHAR(20),
  marker_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (marker_id) REFERENCES GeneticMarkers(marker_id)
);

CREATE TABLE genetic_markers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    marker_name VARCHAR(50),
    marker_type VARCHAR(50),
    chromosome_number INT,
    gene_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE stem_cells (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    cell_type VARCHAR(50),
    differentiation_potential VARCHAR(50),
    donor_age INT,
    donor_gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE marker_relationships (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    marker_id INT,
    cell_id INT,
    correlation_score FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (marker_id) REFERENCES genetic_markers(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (cell_id) REFERENCES stem_cells(id)
);

CREATE TABLE GeneticMarkers (
    marker_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    marker_name TEXT,
    chromosome_number INT,
    marker_location TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE StemCells (
    cell_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_expression TEXT,
    differentiation_potential INT,
    donor_id UUID
)

CREATE TABLE CellDonors (
    donor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    donor_name TEXT,
    donor_age INT,
    donation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE MarkerExpression (
    expression_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    marker_id UUID,
    cell_id UUID,
    expression_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Stem_Cell_Differentiation (
    cell_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    differentiation_stage VARCHAR(50),
    differentiation_potential FLOAT,
    marker_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (marker_id) REFERENCES Genetic_Markers(marker_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Experimental_Results (
    experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    cell_id INT,
    percentage_differentiation FLOAT,
    result VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (cell_id) REFERENCES Stem_Cell_Differentiation(cell_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Research_Teams (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(50),
    team_lead VARCHAR(50),
    institution VARCHAR(50),
    field_of_study VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Team_Members (
    member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_id INT,
    member_name VARCHAR(50),
    role VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES Research_Teams(team_id)
);
